text: Imitation of Life is a 1934 American romantic drama movie directed by John M. Stahl and was based on the 1933 novel of the same name by Fannie Hurst. It stars Claudette Colbert, Warren William, Rochelle Hudson, Ned Sparks, Louise Beavers, Alan Hale Sr. and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1935. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1934 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John M. Stahl Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Imitation of Life (1934 movie)
